name: I'm Alright
description:
I'm Alright is a stealth pixel platformer game where you must escape from this horrific environment to find out what has happened to you.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9n0bclq6kM8

Features

  • Hide by leaning against doors or by crawling through vents
  • Hand drawn art and animations
  • Immersive sounds and music
  • Open to interpretation story


Release Date: November 17, 2015

Free to play

Contact Details: allenjayroldan@gmail.com
